tech_news.title: Bloodstained Director Shutaro Iida Passes Away at 52 as Sequel Production Enters Its Final Stages - Noisy Pixel
tech_news.description: ArtPlay announces the passing of Bloodstained director Shutaro Iida at 52 as Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement nears completion.

tech_news.title: Pixel's 'Now Playing' is becoming a real app, but not for everyone - Android Authority
tech_news.description: Google is spinning Pixel's Now Playing feature into a standalone app on the Play Store, but not everyone will be able to download it.

tech_news.description: Inti Creates has released a new trailer for hybrid 2D action and strategy game Kingdom’s Return: Time-Eating Fruit and the Ancient Monster introducing the Alchemist class.

tech_news.title: 5 MagSafe Gadgets You'll Use Every Day - bgr.com
tech_news.description: If you think MagSafe on your iPhone is only for wireless charging, you might be surprised by the variety of gadgets it supports, such as SSDs, mounts, and more.

tech_news.description: Players should watch out for these promising open world games that are currently scheduled to launch later this year.

tech_news.title: Windows 11 KB5077181 fixes boot failures linked to failed updates - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: Microsoft says it has resolved a Windows 11 bug that caused some commercial systems to fail to boot with an "UNMOUNTABLE_BOOT_VOLUME" error after installing recent security updates, with the fix delivered in the February 2026 Patch Tuesday update.

tech_news.title: Longtime NPR host David Greene sues Google over NotebookLM voice - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The longtime host of NPR’s “Morning Edition,” is suing Google, alleging that the male podcast voice in the company’s NotebookLM tool is based on him.

tech_news.description: Nintendo has put eight different Switch games on sale, including Super Mario RPG, Xenoblade Chronicles X, Zelda: Link's Awakening, and more.
